catalogue_raissonne: Hind 280 os; Bartsch 83; Münz 232 os; Holl. 83 os; Biörklund 54-G, Blanc 58
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1956
markings: blue stamp verso, \"Emile Galichon\", Lugt 1058; black ink verso, \"E\" in oval (not in Lugt)
provenance: Emile Galichon (1829-1875), Lugt 1058, Paris. [Goldschmidt Galleries, New York, until 1956; sold, April 12, for $1,650, to Mia]
title: The Descent from the Cross by Torchlight
